nodes.text: Oggdo Bogdo were a rare subspecies of the Oggdo, a dangerous predator native to the Outer Rim planet Bogano. Highly aggressive and ferocious, the creature was larger and much deadlier than a common Oggdo with its lightsaber-resistant shell.
The Oggdo Bogdo had lightsaber-resistant shell, three eyes and a light orange prehensile tongue that could shoot out and grab prey, pulling them into their jaws.

The Oggdo Bogdo were considered to be deadlier than their more common oggdo counterparts. While hunting down prey, they would constantly maneuver to inflict greater injuries at a closer range. The creatures' shell was highly resilient against lightsabers.
During the Jedi Padawan Cal Kestis' quest to rebuild the Jedi Order in the year 14 BBY, he encountered and killed an Oggdo Bogdo in the Bogdo Sinkholes on Bogano.

The Oggdo Bogdo first appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order developed by Respawn Entertainment. In the game, the creature serves as one of the four "mysterious creatures" that the player needs to defeat in order to achieve 100% game completion.
